Is it acceptable to go to bed at 8pm? #SoTired
Today, I've asked my love to contact the photographer for our wedding. I'm betting he won't do it until I've asked at least 7 times?
I need to build a pillow fort with my love today. I want to sleep all day. #adultsgonewrong
I am disgusted with people - mainly Donald Trump and whoever left a used tampon applicator rolling around the bus. #grossversionsofdodgeball
My love genuinely asked me to lay on his side of the bed to warm it up before he got in, who on earth does he think he is?! #princess

He's doing it... he's actually doing it! Miracles do happen!
@Emilyylime05 sending all my love. Is there anything I can do? Yeah, better then they have been! How's work been? Xx
I asked if that was the last round, it clearly says "round 1" at the top of the screen.. he said yes
I've gone and gotten lunch jar out of his bag, it's like having to ask a small child if they've done their homework!
I'm going to bed at 10.30, if it's not clean, he's not getting fed..
He's started another round, he keeps singing "you are my favourite" - not sure he's trying to get out of the jobs or he's talking to the tv
Maybe if I stick the jar under his nose, he'll get the hint?! Am I letting all women down giving him subtle clues to what I need him to do?
He currently making noises at the tv whilst playing #RainbowSixSiege - I refuse to do his jobs for him. #ishallnotbebroken
I still see the plates on the draining board and someone hasn't moved from the spot I left him in...an hour ago #fianceproblems
Seeing how long it takes for my love to do the two small jobs I asked him to do tonight. Put the washing up away & wash his lunchbox.
